summary: This mode adds a very special house that you can get by completing a noble quest.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/15/16/49/81/banner10.jpg[/img][/center]

[b]Author :[/b] Seb263
[b]Current Version :[/b] Bêta 1.0 ([i]Updated the 01/04/2012[/i])
[b][color=#008000]If you like this mod, don't forget to support it.[/color][/b]

[center][img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/15/16/49/81/introd10.png[/img]

You thought you visited Skyrim in every inch?
Well, it seems you have missed a very special house during your expeditions in this vast and hostile world.
According to rumors, the house has been attacked by a group of bandits in quest of treasures and blood.
The dragonborn seems completely appropriate in this kind of situation ... And who knows, maybe he will be rewarded for his help.

[youtube]9zeKc4weF1E[/youtube]

[img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/15/16/49/81/featur10.png[/img][/center]

[b]- A companion who will follow you in your adventures and will help to renovate the house. (Voice available)[/b]

[list][b]- A living room with :[/b][*]An alchemy table and a enchanting station.
[*]An automated storage system for potions and ingredients.
[*]A functional library. (480 locations)
[*]Furniture to add.
[*]Plants to add.
[*]Fountains to add.
[b]- A temple with :[/b][*]8 Mannequins to add.
[*]32 Weapons racks and shields to add.
[*]26 Chests to add.
[*]A statue to display among 9 choices.
[*]An altar to display among 9 choices.
[b]- A workshop with :[/b][*]A forge.
[*]A smelter.
[*]A sharpening wheel.
[*]An tanning rack.
[*]An workbench.
[*]Various racks and chests to store your weapons.
[/list]
[b]- A prison. (not over yet)[/b]

[b]- Fixed torches that you can light with the fire of your own torches.[/b]

[i][b]Most of these objects can be bought with gold.[/b][/i]

[center][img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/15/16/49/81/requim10.png[/img]

[b]There are no prerequisites for this mod.[/b]
(It still recommended to keep your game up to date)

[img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/15/16/49/81/instal10.png[/img][/center]
[b]It is recommended to use the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] to install this mod.[/b]

1. Find the "Data" folder in the source folder of Skyrim.
(Default: C: \ Program Files \ Steam \ steamapps \ common \ Skyrim \ Data)
2. Place all the downloaded files of the archive in the "Data folder.
3. Start SkyrimLauncher.exe then click "Data Files".
4. Check the box of the RiverEdge Home mod.

[center][img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/15/16/49/81/archiv10.png[/img][/center]
[b]Version 1.0 Bêta :[/b]
- Launch Version (English).

[center][img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/15/16/49/81/faq11.png[/img][/center]
[b]Q.[/b] Does this work with the Nexus Mod Manager?
[b]A.[/b] Yes.

[b]Q.[/b] I see floating grass on the outside, what to do?
[b]A.[/b] Open the "Skyrim.ini" file located in "My Documents \ My Games \ Skyrim".
Find [Grass] and add (or change):
bAllowLoadGrass = 0
bAllowCreateGrass = 1
bDrawShaderGrass = 1

Q. I can not beat the old master. How to kill him?
[b]A.[/b] The minimum recommended level to defeat him is LVL10. If you want to cheat, open the console then click on the master and type "Kill".

[b]Q.[/b] I have problems with the automatic storage system.
[b]A.[/b] The automatic storage system is not 100% reliable. If a version of the "SKSE" compatible with the "creation kit" is published, It is highly likely that i upgrade this system.

[b]Q.[/b] Can I make renovations if I do not have enough gold?
[b]A.[/b] Yes, simply add gold to your inventory by typing "Player.AddItem F GOLD", ex : "Player.AddItem F 3000" or you can use the command "SetStage REHRenovationQuest 50" if you want to get all the renovations.

[center][img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/15/16/49/81/notes10.png[/img][/center]
This is my first mod on the nexus, so i may have missed some details.
Please, let me know if this is the case.

It is possible that you find vocabulary errors because i'm french and I don't speak English perfectly.
So, please let me know if you find vocabularies errors in the mod.

Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=4219095]Morg198[/url] for corrections that he made on my imperfect English.

[center][img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/15/16/49/81/legal10.png[/img][/center]
This mod [b]can't[/b] be used / published without my permission.
It is still in Bêta phase and i want it to finish it before putting it on the Steam Workshop.

If you want to make an add-on relating to this mod, please letting me know.
author: Seb263
